attributes.title: Worst app ever! Do not get
attributes.review: IT IS PRETTY MUCH A VIRUS DO NOT DOWNLOAD. It traps you in the app!!! The home button doesn’t work and this has happened to all of my friends. It also won’t let you use your volume buttons. It took days for it to even download and took up lots of storage! Along with this it doesn’t even work. It crashed many times and it has the 1D10T error.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE!!!
attributes.review: i wanted to download this app to support our absolutely not racist president but when i tried downloading it, it took hours to download. also when i first opened the app a big orange monster popped up on the screen i think that the president should be there when you first open the app not an ugly racist homophobic ugly monster. i do not recommend this app at all!😡😡🍊🍊🍊

attributes.title: I can’t believe it
attributes.review: You know I used to be a big believer in making the country great but then I decided to stop  Fantasizing about my cousin and my mind was opened. Once I realized that there was more to this country than guns and beer I really got to thinkin. Thank you DT. Cuz if you weren’t such a big piece of garbage, I would have never thought about other things. Like common sense and human life.

attributes.title: DO NOT INSTALL!!!!!
attributes.review: it broke my phone!!! i had to replace it TWICE!! my phone is still glitching, this is ridiculous. i had to RISK getting the virus and leave my house to get a new phone TWO TIMES. that put my family AND i in danger!!! i repeat DO NOT download this app. you will regret it, i was even getting msgs from the app, they were harassing me. biggest mistake of my life was downloading this app!!

attributes.title: absolutely terrible 💅✨🧚🍊
attributes.review: i just wanted to support our cheeto god but the app crashed, took me to the app store, and tried to give itself 5 stars 😰 but it’s all good, i went back to the app and tried to delete the app then some fbi guys broke my door down and took my lizard 😭 now i have no lizard and no door 🤬so further more this app left me door less and lizard less😔 SOMETIMES 🌸 I ✨DONT 💅 WANNA 🧚 BE 😻 HAPPY 💋

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: As soon as I opened it up my phone glitched all crazy and turned off it wouldn’t start up again, when I finally got it to work everything was deleted, 0/10 app useless and for this being the presidents app I expected a lot more this app was garbage and deserves to be taken down just like the current president.🤮🤮

attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.review: This app took way to long to download and it was horrible. The picture and grammar in the articles gave a terrible impression of our already bad and terrible president. I’m so extremely disappointed with this app. The news was not real and disrespectful. Piece if trash of an app I might even say. Actually I do say that. I will not recommend thus app to anyone EVER.

attributes.title: Worst app
attributes.review: This app is quite possible the worst app i have come across. It is completely on brand with president🍊. Upon opening this app immediately a flock of wild Caucasians started following me. As a person of color i felt terrified. It didn’t end there! The app also brought a curse on my family and i am completely convinced this app is the reason my house burnt down.

attributes.title: Broke my phone
attributes.review: This app took a whole week to download I was looking forward to educate myself on our president. This app, as I mentioned took a WHOLE WEEK to download. After it did the app kept crashing over and over, so I decided to power off my phone then power it back in to see if that would help. My phone never turned back on. 😒😠

attributes.title: Don’t get this app
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see what all the hype about it was and that was such a mistake. The app tracked me and sent me threatening messages like chain mail. Next thing I know my grandma is possessed and won’t stop screaming make America great again. Would not recommend getting this app unless you like getting spammed with text messages and emails that threaten you. ✨😔
